biotools.summary: Database of indels in protein structures and their flanking regions. Contains indels with flanking regions extracted from structural alignment pairs of non-redundant domains from superfamilies. Provides access to information about indels and their flanking regions.

bioschemas.name: IndelFR
bioschemas.summary: Database of indels in protein structures and their flanking regions. Contains indels with flanking regions extracted from structural alignment pairs of non-redundant domains from superfamilies. Provides access to information about indels and their flanking regions.
